column2: "Nna banyin bi wɔ hɔ a ofi Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu a ne dzin dze Mika."

column3: Dwetɛbona ɔhadubiako no a wɔfaa no wɔ wo nkyɛn no a epaae wɔ ho
column4: na ekasaa ho so wɔ m’asomu no
column6: dwetɛ no wɔ mo hɔ; mara na mefae. Na ne na see dɛ
column7: EWURADZE mma nhyira nka me ba."

column2: "Na ɔdaan ndwetɛbona ɔhadubiako no dze maa ne na
column4: Otu na metu dwetɛ no efi me nsa mu esi nkyɛn ama EWURADZE dɛ wɔmfa mma me ba
column5: ma ɔmfa nyɛ ohonyi a oesian na ohonyi a woegu: dɛm ntsi afei mebɛdan ama wo."

column2: "Na aber a ɔdaan sika no dze maa ne na no
column4: na ɔdze maa ogufo na ɔdze yɛɛ osian honyi na ogu honyi: wɔ Mika fie."

column5: na ɔtseew ne mbabanyin no mu baako ho a ɔbɛyɛɛ no sɔfoe."

column2: "Nda no mu no nna ɔhen bi nnyi Israel ntsi nyimpa biara yɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ nankasa n’enyi do."
"Na aberantsɛ bi wɔ hɔ a ofi Bɛtlɛhɛm-juda
column3: wɔ Juda ebusua mu a ɔyɛ Levinyi

column2: "Na banyin no sii mu fii kurow no mu
column4: dɛ ɔrokɔ beebi mbrɛ obenya tsenabew: na otuu kwan bodur Mika fie wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu."

column3: Ifi hen nam? Na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: na morokɔ makɛtsena beebi mbrɛ mibenya tsenabew."

column4: na yɛ egya na ɔsɔfo ma me
column5: na mebɛma wo dwetɛbona du afrenhyia
column7: na w’edziban. Nna Levinyi no kɔr fie."

column2: "Na Levinyi no peen dɛ ɔnye Mika bɛtsena; na aberantsɛ no yɛɛ no dɛ ne mbabanyin mu baako."

column3: na aberantsɛ no bɛyɛɛ no sɔfoe
Afei na mehu dɛ EWURADZE bɛyɛ me yie
column4: dɛ menya Levinyi ma odzi me sɔfo yi."
